content: How much do I owe in taxes?

Tax rate,Taxable income threshold
2.00%, on the portion of taxable income that is $3000 or less, plus
3.00%, on the portion of taxable income over $3000 up to $5000 plus
5.00%, on the portion of taxable income over $5000 up to $17000 plus
5.75%, on the portion of taxable income over $17000
